lua_comment: The above snippet moves the <%=class_name%>100 pixels to the right, and 50 pixels down, from the center of the <%=tile%>.
description: Changes the offset of this <%=class_name%> from the center of the <%=tile%> they're standing on.
**Positive** X values move it to the *right*, **negative** X values move it to the *left*.
**Positive** Y values move it *downwards*, **negative** Y values move it *upwards*.
